name: BotKip.py
short_description: BotKip.py is an IRC bot that can be used on all POSIX (linux,bsd,etc) with python installed. BotKip is a very dynamic bot that currently has a huge array of features. BotKip is able to handle an array of threaded bot instances per server/channel(s).
